markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=167)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 347 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Gogunta](/Deities.aspx?ID=25), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=10), [Jin Li](/Deities.aspx?ID=264), [Kabriri](/Deities.aspx?ID=76), [Kabriri](/Deities.aspx?ID=76), [Sun Wukong](/Deities.aspx?ID=183), [The Divine Dare](/Deities.aspx?ID=269)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your legs surge with strength, ready to leap high and far. You jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** The range becomes touch, the target changes to one touched creature, and the duration becomes 1 minute, allowing the target to jump as described whenever it takes the Leap action.
name: Jump

<traits>
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 347 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<summary>
Make an impressive leap.
</summary>
text: Jump Source Core Rulebook pg. 347 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Gogunta, Irori, Jin Li, Kabriri, Kabriri, Sun Wukong, The Divine Dare Cast Single Action somatic --- Your legs surge with strength, ready to leap high and far. You jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action. --- Heightened (3rd) The range becomes touch, the target changes to one touched creature, and the duration becomes 1 minute, allowing the target to jump as described whenever it takes the Leap action.
